attributes.action: remain in office for a further 10 glorious years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned call on Tony Blair to revoke his resignation and remain as Prime Minister, because we think he has much nicer manners than Gordon Brown, and we like the way his eyes twinkle

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
